name: dzasa/open-exchange-rates
description: A PHP wrapper for Openexchangerates.org API with extended functionalities.

suggest.ext-json: Parse json returned from OpenExchangeRates.org API.
suggest.ext-curl: Use CURL when calling OpenExchangeRates.org API.
suggest.ext-memcache: Use Memcache when calling OpenExchangeRates.org API.
